snippet.title: The Anomaly Project - Teaser Trailer | Multiplayer Horror Game | Steam | Unreal Engine 5
snippet.description:
💦 Get The Anomaly Project on Steam:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2960770/The_Anomaly_Project/

😱What kinda game is The Anomaly Project?👻:

Your goal is simple, spot anomalies to escape. Play alone or together with up to 8 players in online co-op. Make the right decisions to advance to the next level, or risk being reset to the beginning!

In The Anomaly Project you and co-players have to try and escape by noticing Anomalies and making the decision to go in either the Red tube or the Green tube. If you have decided correctly you progress to the next level. Otherwise you are reset to the first level. Will you ever escape...?

#horrorgaming #backrooms #gameplay 

Game testers: @IrishManPlays @Kekdot 
---
